description: Mobile techniques used by Bouncing Golf, ATT&CK group G0097 (v1.0)
name: Bouncing Golf (G0097)

techniques.comment: [Bouncing Golf](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0097) distributed malware as repackaged legitimate applications, with the malicious code in the `com.golf` package.(Citation: Trend Micro Bouncing Golf 2019)
